Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Authorizes Sean Lewis to take the competitive civil service examination for employment as a full-time deputy sheriff for the county of Sullivan
Summary: Authorizes Sean Lewis to take the competitive civil service examination and be placed on the eligible civil service list for employment as a full-time deputy sheriff for the county of Sullivan; exempts such applicant from the age restriction.
ActClause: AN ACT to authorize Sean Lewis to take the competitive civil service examination and be placed on the eligible civil service list for employment as a full-time police officer for the county of Sullivan
